settings.heading: Summer Box Coming Soon! Get on the waitlist so you don't miss out...
When is the last time you did something just for yourself?
settings.content: The SKN.VST.MNT box is a quarterly subscription box FILLED with unique, hand-crafted skin care products designed to meet your skin's seasonal needs. You will never find these products in a retail store (or online) - except for maybe Essentially Haitos! ;-)

settings.heading: The best thing about the SKN.VST.MNT box is that it's a complete surprise every time!

settings.text: We love giving you hints and sneak peeks, but ultimately we want you to have the joy of opening it - and experiencing it - for yourself.

Each box includes a minimum of 5 mystery products formulated and / or hand-selected by Karen and Alicia revolving around a coordinated product theme, color, or season. See all subscriber reviews here.

settings.heading: What is SKN.VST.MNT?
settings.row_content:
Each SKN.VST.MNT self-care box is designed to promote skincare and selfcare - and to make it natural, fresh, unique, and enjoyable!

While we won't tell you exactly what's in each box (where's the fun in that?), we will tell you each box contains a minimum of 5 items:

  1. One product is formulated, hand-crafted and exclusive to the box (never before released / intent is not to release in the near future).
  2. One to-be-released product (our intent is to eventually release this product in the Essentially Haitos line-up)
  3. One regular Essentially Haitos product
  4. One favorite product from another small skin care brand
  5. One non-skin care (but self care) product
  6. A possible additional product to complement the other items in the box

settings.heading: More than just another box...
settings.row_content:
What we know about our subscribers is that SKN.VST.MNT is more than just a box of skincare to them. It's a gift to themselves. As women, we do for everyone around us and rarely take the time to do something just for us.

Yes, this box contains original, natural, hand-crafted skincare and self-care items, but the feeling you get when you receive your box is what it is all about!

settings.heading: How does the subscription work?
settings.row_content:
This is a quarterly subscription box, which means you will receive one new, unique box every three months.

When you make your initial purchase, your card (or PayPal) will be charged and your SKN.VST.MNT box will ship within 5-7 days.

After that, your payment method will be charged every three months on the 10th of the month and your new box will ship close to the 15th.

The SKN.VST.MNT boxes are planned for February, May, August, and November; therefore, your card will be charged on the 10th of those months.

When you choose to subscribe, a customer portal will be created for you to manage your subscription, including pausing, cancelling, resubscribing, and changing payment methods.

You may cancel your subscription at any time.

settings.text: Next Box available for purchase August 7th - 11th.
